description: Look up individual vault stats here

targets.expr: count(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", vault="$vaults", param="isActive", experimental="$exp", address="$address", version="$version"} > 0)
yearn_strategy{network="$networks", vault="$vaults", param="isActive", experimental="$exp", address="$address", version="$version"} > 0.1
yearn_strategy{network="$networks", vault="$vaults", param="isActive", experimental="$exp", address="$address", version="$version"} < 0.1
count(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", vault="$vaults", param="isActive", experimental="$exp", address="$address", version="$version"} < 0.1)

panels.description: Total amount of Deposit tokens in vault

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults", address="$address", version="$version", experimental="$exp"}

panels.title: totalAssets

panels.description: The total amount of Deposit tokens in the vault in dollars

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults", address="$address", version="$version", experimental="$exp"}

panels.title: totalAssets ($)

panels.description: Share price of Vault token

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults", address="$address", version="$version", experimental="$exp"}

panels.title: Share Price

panels.description: totalDebt / totalAssets

targets.expr: sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", address="$address", version="$version", experimental="$exp"}) / on(vault, version) sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults", address="$address", version="$version", experimental="$exp"})

panels.title: % of Assets Deployed

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault="$vaults", address="$address", version="$version", experimental="$exp"} / on(vault, version) yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="depositLimit", vault="$vaults", address="$address", version="$version", experimental="$exp"}

panels.description: Price of the underlying deposit token

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="token price", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}

panels.title: Deposit Token Price

panels.description: Sum of the total amount of gain from all strategies in underlying token.

targets.expr: sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalGain", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})

panels.title: totalGain

panels.description: Sum of all gains actualized from all strategies in terms of $

targets.expr: sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalGain", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})
yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="token price", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}

sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalGain", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) * yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="token price", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}

panels.title: totalGain $

panels.description: The total amount of deposit token allocated to strategies.

targets.expr: sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})

panels.title: totalDebt

targets.expr: (yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} / yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset $__range) - 1

panels.title: % Share Price Change Over Time Range

panels.description: Sum of all losses actualized from all strategies in underlying token terms

targets.expr: sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})

panels.title: totalLoss

panels.description: Sum of all losses actualized from all strategies in $

targets.expr: sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})
yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="token price", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}

sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) * yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="token price", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}

panels.title: totalLoss $

panels.description: totalAssets - totalDebt. If you are looking to make a withdrawal this is how much the vault has free for lower fee withdrawals that wont pull from the funds of strategies that are currently deployed. Denominated in deposit token.

targets.expr: sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) - on(vault, version) sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})

panels.title: Free Funds

targets.expr: (((delta(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}[7d]) + 1) ^ (1/7)) ^ 365 - 1)

panels.description: totalAssets - totalDebt. If you are looking to make a withdrawal this is how much the vault has free for lower fee withdrawals that wont pull from the funds of strategies that are currently deployed. Denominated in $.

targets.expr: (sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) - on(vault, version) sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})) * yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="token price", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}

panels.title: Free Funds ($)

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}
yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="depositLimit", vault=~"$vaults", address="$address", version="$version", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}

yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault="$vaults", address="$address", version="$version", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} / on(vault, version) yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="depositLimit", vault="$vaults", address="$address", version="$version", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}

panels.description:
Breakdown of assets in vault.
TotalAssets = total amount in the vault.
TotalDebt = total amount allocated to strategies

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}
yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}
sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})

panels.title: Strategy Allocations Overview

panels.description: Breakdown of free assets. If you see free assets in the vault you can withdrawal from it under this for cheaper and it wont have to pull funds from strategies.

targets.expr: sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) - on(vault, version) sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})

(sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) - on(vault, version) sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})) / (yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})

panels.title: Assets free in vault

panels.description: Breakdown of assets in vault

targets.expr: sort_desc(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} > 0.01)

panels.title: Strategy Allocations Overview

panels.description: Total amount of Deposit tokens in strategy

targets.expr: yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}

panels.title: totalDebt

panels.description: Total amount of assets in native token denomination delegated to other vaults

targets.expr: (yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="delegatedAssets", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"} / 1000000000000000000) > 0

panels.title: Delegated Assets

panels.description: Total amount of assets in $ delegated to other vaults.

targets.expr: (yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="delegatedAssets", experimental="$exp",vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"} / 1000000000000000000 > 0) * on(vault, version) group_left yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="token price", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}

panels.title: Delegated Assets $

panels.description: Price of deposit token

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="token price", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}

panels.title: Deposit Token Price

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} - yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 1d

(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} / yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 1d ) - 1

sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) - sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 1d)

(sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) / sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 1d)) - 1

sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) - sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 1d)

(sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) / sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 1d)) - 1

yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} - yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 7d

(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} / yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 7d ) - 1

sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) - sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 7d)

(sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}) / sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"} offset 7d)) - 1

sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) - sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 7d)

(sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) / sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset 7d)) - 1

panels.description: Total Gain in deposit token terms per strategy

targets.expr: yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalGain", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}
sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalGain", vault=~"$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"})

panels.title: Total Gain

panels.description: totalLoss per strategy

targets.expr: yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}
sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"})

panels.title: Total Loss

panels.description: Total amount of Gain - Loss

targets.expr: sum by (strategy) (yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param=~"totalGain", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}) - sum by (strategy) (yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"})

panels.title: Total Gain - Loss

panels.description: Rate of change of total 5m delta

targets.expr: sum by (strategy) (delta(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param=~"totalGain", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}[5m])) - sum by (strategy) (delta(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}[5m]))

panels.title: Total Gain - Loss Delta

targets.expr: sort(time() - (yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="lastReport", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}))

panels.description: Keepers need to call Havest before this time.

targets.expr: sort(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="maxReportDelay", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"})

panels.title: maxReportDelay

panels.description: Min amount of before Keepers can call harvest again

targets.expr: sort(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="minReportDelay", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"})

panels.title: minReportDelay

panels.description: Current Share Price for the vault selected

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}

panels.title: Share Price

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} - yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset $__range

panels.title: Share Price - Change over Time Range Selected

targets.expr: (yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} / yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"} offset $__range) - 1

panels.title: Share Price - % Share Price Change over Time Range Selected

targets.expr: (((delta(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}[7d]) + 1) ^ (1/7)) ^ 365 - 1)
yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp", version="$version", address="$address"}

panels.description:
APY Taking the Weekly Difference of Share Price
With Weekly Compounding

targets.expr: (((delta(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", experimental="$exp", vault="$vaults", version="$version", address="$address"}[7d]) + 1) ^ (1/7)) ^ 365 - 1) < 15000

panels.title: APY

targets.expr: sort_desc((yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="debtRatio", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}/100 > 0))
sort_desc(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="debtThreshold", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}/1000000000000000)

panels.description: Max amount of allocatable funds per harvest

targets.expr: sort_desc(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="maxDebtPerHarvest", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"})

panels.title: maxDebtPerHarvest

panels.description: Vault debtRatio

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="debtRatio", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}/100

panels.title: debtRatio Vault

panels.description: Strategies debtRatio summed

targets.expr: sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="debtRatio", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}/100)

panels.title: debtRatio Strategies

panels.description: Min amount of allocatable funds per harvest

targets.expr: sort_desc(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="minDebtPerHarvest", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"})

panels.title: minDebtPerHarvest

panels.description: Activation Date

targets.expr: sort(time() - yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="activation", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"})

panels.title: Date Added

panels.description: Amount of funds to keep for withdrawals

targets.expr: yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="buffer", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}/1000

panels.title: buffer

panels.description: availableDepositLimit

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="availableDepositLimit", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}

panels.title: Deposit Limit

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="lockedProfit", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}
yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="lockedProfitDegradation", vault=~"$vaults", experimental="$exp"}

list.label: address
list.name: address

title: Vault Overview
